Verses: 1 annaalile Paavaththaiyum Azhukkaiyum Neekka, Dhaaveedhin Kudumbaththaarukkum Erusalemin Kudigalukkum Thirakkappatta Oru Ootru Undaayirukkum.

2 annaalile Naan Vikkiragangalinperum Dhesaththiliraadhapadikku Azhippen; Avaigal Ini Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Dharisanam Sollugiravargalaiyum, Asuththa Aaviyaiyum Dhesaththilirundhu Poividavum Pannuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

3 ini Oruvan Dharisanam Sonnaal, Avanaippetra Avan Thagappanum Avan Thaayum Avanai Nokki: Nee Karththarudaiya Naamaththaikkondu Poipesugirapadiyaal Nee Uyirodirukkappadaadhu Endru Solli, Avanaip Petra Avan Thagappanum Avan Thaayum Avan Dharisanam Sollumpodhu Avanaik Kuththippoduvaargal.
4 annaalile Dharisanam Sollugira Avanavan Thaan Sonna Dharisanaththinaal Vetkappattu, Poisollumpadikku Ini Mayirpporvaiyaip Poththukkollaamal,
5 naan Dharisanam Sollugiravan Alla, Naan Nilaththaip Payiridugiravan; En Siruvayadhumudhal Oruvan Ennai Velaikondaan Enbaan.
6 appozhudhu Oruvan Avanai Nokki: Un Kaigalil Irukkira Indha Vadukkal Edhendru Kettaal, En Snegidharin Veettile Kaayappattadhinaal Undaanavaigal Enbaan.

7 pattayame, En Meyppanmelum En Thozhanaagiya Purushanmelum Ezhumbu Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar, Meyppanai Vettuven, Appozhudhu Aadugal Sidharippogum; Aanaalum En Karaththai Siruvarmel Thirumba Vaippen.
8 dhesamengum Sambavikkum Kaariyam Ennavendraal, Adhil Irukkira Irandu Pangu Manushar Sangarikkappattu Maandupovaargal; Moondraam Pango Adhil Meedhiyaayirukkum.

9 andha Moondraam Pangai Naan Akkinikkutpadappanni, Velliyai Urukkugiradhupola Avargalai Urukki, Ponnaip Pudamidugiradhupola Avargalaip Pudamiduven; Avargal En Naamaththaith Thozhudhukolvaargal; Naan Avargal Vinnappaththaik Ketpen; Idhu En Janamendru Naan Solluven, Karththar En Dhevanendru Avargal Solluvaargal.
